The MARC-HI Visualizer architecture has changed in order to allow it to function in a more flexible manner. The visualizer is now distributed as a Microsoft Silverlight application which can be run from any web browser. The Silverlight application is permitted to connect to a host known as the "Visualizer Host" or "Infrastructure".
